tag_list: eric-bell, ceo, founder, bell-social-media-group, bell-smg, the-market-research-global-alliance, mrga, the-mrga, mrgasn, ceoxing, ceo-crossing, gma, global-marketing-alliance, smia, sales--marketing-innovation-alliance
overview:
Eric Bell is known for creating the first recognized social network for market researchers in 2005.

Mr. Bell has worked in the for-profit computer custom training, event management, and market research industry, as well as a early pioneer in social media sciences.

Previous to his experience in business we was a Corporal in the United States Marine Corps from 1992 - 2006. Holding Meritorious Multiple Accommodations for service excellence.

He holds degrees in Associate of Arts in Business Management, his Bachelor Science in Business Management from the University of Phoenix, Phoenix, Arizona and Master of Business Administration from George Fox University, Newberg, Oregon.

Mr. Bell is the CEO of Bell Social Media Group based in Canemah, Oregon.
